name: Golbat
author: Kanako Eo
flavor_text: Once it bites, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

abilities.name: Sneaky Bite
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon.

attacks.name: Swoop Across
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
